sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPINIFEX, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the glaſs of polygamia and order of mοnaecia. The hermaphrodite flowers have a calyx with bivalved biflorous glumes, the valvelets being parallel to the rachis; the corolla is bivalved and awnleſs ; there are three ſtamina and two ſtyles. In the male flowers the calyx is common with the hermaphrodite ; the corolla and stamina are ſimilar. There is only one ſpecies, the ſquarroſus.
